channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s everything Apple announced at the WWDC 2024 keynote, including Apple Intelligence, Siri makeover

item.title: Danish Media Threatens to Sue OpenAI

item.title: TechCrunch Space: A week that will go down in history

item.title: AI Is Apple’s Best Shot at Getting You to Upgrade Your iPhone
item.description: Apple is limiting its new artificial intelligence features to new phones, in hopes of a sunny September.

item.title: Elon Musk threatens to ban Apple devices from his companies over Apple’s ChatGPT integrations

item.title: Apple confirms plans to work with Google’s Gemini ‘in the future’

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 9 and Google Pixel Watch 2 Are on Sale
item.description: In the market for a smartwatch? Maybe you’re looking for a Father’s Day gift—now’s an excellent time to save on our favorites.

item.title: How Urvashi Barooah broke into venture after everyone told her she couldn’t
